title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise, Trade
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Section
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Companies Act 2014 (Section 

682) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 1 October 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited company act 2014 (section 682) regulation 2023 (2) regulation come operation 1 october 2023

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise, Trade
heading: 2. The form set out in the Schedule to these Regulations is prescribed for
text_raw:
2. The form set out in the Schedule to these Regulations is prescribed for 
the purposes of section 682(2) of the Companies Act of 2014 (No. 38 of 2014). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th September, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [474] 3
text_norm: 2 form set schedule regulation prescribed purpose section 682(2) company act 2014 (no 38 2014) notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 29th september 2023 474 3

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise, Trade
heading: Is there a deficiency in any tax return or
text_raw:
20. 

Is there a deficiency in any tax return or 
payment of taxes? 

Yes: 

No: 

If yes, please specify the periods, if any, for which returns are overdue and/or 
the amounts due. Please also specify the amounts paid in respect of those 
periods. (Please attach to this Report a copy of the Revenue Statement of 
Collections and Payments that issued to you upon your appointment as liquidator. 
If not attached, please state why not.)

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise, Trade
heading: 21. Have you any information which may lead you to believe that there was a
text_raw:
21. Have you any information which may lead you to believe that there was a 
person acting as a shadow director of the Company? (Please note that the 
expression ‘shadow director’ may include an individual or a body corporate.) 

Yes: 

No: 

If yes, please provide the following details for the individual/body corporate 
in question: 

a) Full Name: 

b) Current or last known 

address: 

c) What was the Person’s role 

in the Company? 

d) Has the Person demonstrated to you that s/he has acted honestly and 
responsibly in relation to the conduct of the Company’s affairs? 

Yes: 

No: 

Please provide, on a separate sheet, details of the factors which support this 
answer and any other relevant information.

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise, Trade
heading: In this Section, you are required to include every person who appears to you to
text_raw:
23. 

In this Section, you are required to include every person who appears to you to 
be, or to have been, a director of the Company at the date of commencement of 
the winding up or at any time in the 12 months prior to the date of 
commencement of the winding up. 

A separate copy of this Section should be used for each Person. 

a) Full name (including other known names): 

b) Current or last known address: 

c) Date of birth: 

d) Period as director: 

From (date): __________To (date): ____________ 

e) What was the Person’s role in the Company? 

f) Has the Person demonstrated to you that s/he has acted honestly and 
responsibly in relation to the conduct of the Company’s affairs? 

Yes: 

No: 

Please provide, on a separate sheet, details of the factors which support this 
answer. 

g) Other Directorships (Please provide full details of present/past companies of 
which this Person is/was a Director in the period from 12 months prior to the date 
of commencement of the winding up of the Company to date and include the 
company registration number, the date(s) of appointment/termination of the period 
as Director in each case and please indicate if any of these companies operated in 
a sector similar to the Company in liquidation): 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [474] 9 

Section 4: STATEMENT OF AFFAIRS, ACCOUNTS AND 
REPORT TO CREDITORS 

(To be completed as part of the first Report and every subsequent Report where a change 

in details arises.)
text_norm: 23 section required include every person appears director company date commencement winding time 12 month prior date commencement winding up separate copy section used person a) full name (including known names) b) current last known address c) date birth d) period director (date) (date) e) person role company f) person demonstrated acted honestly responsibly relation conduct company affair yes please provide separate sheet detail factor support answer g) directorship (please provide full detail present past company person director period 12 month prior date commencement winding company date include company registration number date(s) appointment termination period director case please indicate company operated sector similar company liquidation) 474 9 section 4 statement affair account report creditor (to completed part first report every subsequent report change detail arises.)

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise, Trade
heading: 26. Audited/Other Accounts (Please attach to this Report a copy of the last two sets of
text_raw:
26. Audited/Other Accounts (Please attach to this Report a copy of the last two sets of 
the audited accounts of the Company and the most recent draft or management 
accounts prepared after the last set of audited accounts. If the Company is 
exempted from audit, please provide a copy of the accounts laid before the AGM for 
the same period and the most recent draft or management accounts. If none are 
attached, please state why not.)
text_norm: 26 audited account (please attach report copy last two set audited account company recent draft management account prepared last set audited account company exempted audit please provide copy account laid agm period recent draft management account none attached please state not.)

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise, Trade
heading: 32. Are you asking the Corporate Enforcement Authority, at this time, to relieve
text_raw:
32. Are you asking the Corporate Enforcement Authority, at this time, to relieve 
you from the requirement to apply, pursuant to section 683 of the Companies 
Act 2014, for the restriction of one or more of the directors of the Company? 

Yes: 

No: 

If yes, is relief being sought for? (Please tick one) 

All directors: 

 Certain named 
directors: 

In either case, please name each director for which relief is sought and state 
the grounds upon which you consider that an application for restriction 
should not now be taken against each individual. 

In respect of any remaining directors, please name them and indicate the 
grounds upon which the application for restriction will be made in each case:

 35. Are any other civil or criminal proceedings being undertaken, or contemplated, 

by any other person against the Company or any of its officers?

text_raw:

Section 7: LIQUIDATOR’S STATEMENT 

(To be completed on every occasion a report is made.) 

I, _______________________________, being the liquidator of the above company, 

state that the details and particulars contained in this Report and all associated 

documentation prepared by me are true, correct and complete, to the best of my 

knowledge and belief. 

Signed: 

Date: 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 16 [474] 

Please ensure that copies of the following are attached to 
this Report: 

• Separate sheets (if applicable) [items 18, 21, 22, 23(f), 25, 30, 32, 33]; 

• Copies of notices of appointment and reports of 

receivers/examiners/liquidators/other officeholders (if applicable) [item 19]; 

• A copy of the Revenue Statement of Collections and Payments that issued to you 

upon your appointment as liquidator [item 20]; 

• Statement of Affairs (or details of assets and liabilities) [item 24]; 

• Last two sets of audited accounts and draft or management accounts subsequently 

prepared, if any [item 26]; 

• Report to Creditors and other relevant material, including minutes of creditors’ 

meeting, Chairperson’s statement to meeting [item 27]; 

• Additional copies of Section 3: Details of Company Directors; 

• Any further information or documentation that you deem to be required. 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 26 September 2023 

DARA CALLEARY, 
 Minister of State at the Department of Enterprise, Trade and 

Employment 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [474] 17

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 519 of 2020) and the Enterprise, Trade
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of these Regulations is to prescribe the form of the liquidator’s 
report to the Corporate Enforcement Authority for the purposes of section 682(2) 
of the Companies Act 2014. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 18 [474]
